articles.title: Market Trading Guide: PNB, Asian Paints among 6 stock recommendations for Friday - Stock Ideas - The Economic Times
articles.description: Indian shares advanced on Thursday, led by banking, auto, and IT stocks. The S&P BSE Sensex closed 0.32% higher at 72,050, while the NSE Nifty50 index settled above the 21,900 level. Nifty is currently placed at the edge of moving above the minor downtrend li…
articles.content:
Target Price: Rs 3,370Stop Loss: Rs 2,880
